title: Under the Wave off Kanagawa (Kanagawa oki nami ura), also known as The Great Wave, from the series "Thirty-Six Views of Mount Fuji (Fugaku sanjurokkei)"
artistDisplayName: Katsushika Hokusai 葛飾 北斎
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Clarence Buckingham Collection

thumbnail.alt_text: A color woodblock print of a large crashing wave, looms over two narrow boats full of people. Mt Fuji in the background.  There is a faint peach colored sky.
